Articles.Content:
when in the SPH, the parts list too the side, and the rest of the GUI elements, flicker, but it seems dependent on where my mouse cursor is sometimes, and what category im on (like propulsion, utility, etc)

here is the ksp.log file: https://gist.githubusercontent.com/321nick/1d314fb2f9776a2eee5ef96f229fd9be/raw/c00f5d99c102b37fe5e30875b7afae8f14c8f3ef/KSP.log  

and here is the mod list, if you need it: https://gist.github.com/321nick/2c03282a540020ccaabed004068416aa 

it may be a bit hard too read, but i have FAR, and alot of part mods, and b9 procedural wings, and pathfinder, and a lot of other part mods and gui mods.
